short_summary: Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking bids for the acquisition of an aluminum landing craft vessel and its trailer for delivery to Havre-Saint-Pierre, Qc.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Parks Canada, is issuing this bid solicitation for the acquisition of an aluminum landing craft vessel and its trailer for delivery to HavreSaint-Pierre, Qc. This is a Request for Proposal only for Holders of Supply Arrangement (SA) E60MC190001. All Small Boats SA holders have been invited to participate per the terms and conditions set out in the SA. If other bidders are interested in submitting a proposal they will have to qualify for the Supply Arrangement before they are given an opportunity to bid on this requirement. If your company is interested becoming a qualified supplier on the Supply Arrangement, you can contact the person responsible for this SA, Vicki Robson, at (613) 2864376.
tags: Bidders must qualify for the Supply Arrangement before they are given an opportunity to bid on this requirement.
full_summary:
---

### Notice of Invitation to Participate - Aluminum Landing Craft

---

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Number
• RFP Number: `5P213-240001`
• Language of Procurement: English and French

---

#### Description
An invitation is hereby extended to qualified Small Boats Holders under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60MC-190001 to express their interest in participating in this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an aluminum landing craft vessel and its trailer for delivery to Havre-Saint-Pierre, Quebec.

#### Deadline
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-04T14:00:00
* Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Invitation Requirements
Only Holders of the specified Supply Arrangement are eligible to participate. Interested Holders not currently qualified for the Supply Arrangement are instructed to contact Vicki Robson at (613) 286-4376 to initiate the qualification process. Participants must possess the required qualifications and experience to be considered for this opportunity.

#### Scope of Work
This RFP calls for the delivery of an aluminum landing craft vessel and its trailer, meeting specific requirements of the Parks Canada Agency.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

• Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
• Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
• Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
• Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
• Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
• Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
• Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
• Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
• World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
• Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

---

#### Notice Information
* Solicitation Number: `WS4556120478`
* Publication Date: 2024-05-30
* Administering Department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* End-User Agency: Parks Canada Agency

---

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Simon Presse at [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Please do not contact the contracting authority with inquiries regarding this opportunity.

Please note the formatting adjustments you made
